title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Experience T-Mobile's Digital Commerce in Action (IND358)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 体验 T-Mobile 的数字商务实践 (IND358)
abstract: Join this technical deep-dive revealing how T-Mobile built their mission-critical platform that handles 200 million daily transactions across 130+ million subscribers with zero-downtime. Discover the serverless-first architecture powering the _T-Mobile website_, T-Life, and 8,000 retail locations that automatically scales from baseline to major device launches and other holiday events. Learn the secrets behind active-active deployment that achieved 99.99% availability through chaos engineering and intelligent failover mechanisms. Uncover how T-Mobile's AI-powered operations reduced MTTR by using machine learning automation that predicts capacity needs and optimizes resource allocation. Walk away with battle-tested architectural patterns for security, scaling, and resiliency.
abstract_cn: 加入这场技术深度探讨，揭示T-Mobile如何构建其关键任务平台，该平台每天处理2亿笔交易，服务超过1.3亿用户，实现零停机。探索支持T-Mobile网站、T-Life和8,000家零售店的无服务器优先架构，可自动从基准负载扩展至重大设备发布和其他节假日活动。了解通过混沌工程和智能故障转移机制实现99.99%可用性的主-主部署背后的秘密。揭示T-Mobile的AI驱动运维如何通过机器学习自动化预测容量需求并优化资源分配，从而降低MTTR。带走经过实战检验的安全、扩展和弹性架构模式。
